TextLang.Text: There is no Memory Stick™ inserted.
Press the ◀ button to go back, or the ▶ button to continue.
Press the ◀ button to go back.

Do you want to save the latest items on the Memory Stick™?
Items other than the latest items being saved now will be deleted.

Do you want to save the latest items in the system storage?
Items other than the latest items being saved now will be deleted.
Select the channels you want to save.

Press the %e button to save the latest items.
Items other than the latest items being saved now will be deleted.
Do you want to save this item on the Memory Stick™?
Do you want to save this item in the system storage?
Save failed. The Memory Stick™ could not be accessed.
Save failed. The system storage could not be accessed.
Save failed. The Memory Stick™ is locked.
Save failed. There are no items available.
This item has already been saved.
The items in this channel have already been saved.
The items in the selected channels have already been saved.
Save failed. There is not enough free space on the Memory Stick™.
Save failed. There is not enough free space in the system storage.
The channel will be saved each day at the set time.
Press the %e button to clear the setting.

Press the %e button to save the setting. To activate the setting, you must turn on the WLAN switch and put the system in sleep mode or turn off the system before the set time. Note that if the system is put in sleep mode during gameplay, the setting will not be activated.

Press the %e button to save the setting. To activate the setting, you must turn on the WIRELESS switch and put the system in sleep mode or turn off the system before the set time. Note that if the system is put in sleep mode during gameplay, the setting will not be activated.
Specify the method for saving the items.
This setting cannot be saved. The following settings are scheduled to be time activated:
The following time-activated settings have priority over this setting:
